luaVersion.title: Default Lua version
luaVersion.description: Can be overriden in .luacompleterc or by plugins

useSnippets.title: Suggest snippets
useSnippets.description: Complete functions with snippets of their arguments

suggestUsedMembers.title: Suggest used table members
suggestUsedMembers.description: Suggest table members that you've used in your code as opposed to just those you have explicitly set or defined

minCharsPrefix.title: Min chars to start completion
minCharsPrefix.description: The minimum number of typed characters required to start a completion

completeModules.title: Complete modules
completeModules.description: Parse require()-d modules for type information

excludeLowerPriority.title: Override lower priority providers
excludeLowerPriority.description: Disable Atom's default keyword-based autocompletion provider and other lower priority providers

inclusionPriority.title: Provider inclusion priority
inclusionPriority.description: Priority relative to other autocomplete providers
